DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate comparative bioavailability Ursodiol 500 mg Tablets ( test ) Urso Forte™ 500 mg Tablets ( reference ) single-dose healthy subject fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Ursodiol Tablets 500 mg Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Criteria Evaluation : FDA Bioequivalence Criteria Statistical Methods : FDA bioequivalence statistical method
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking male female subject , 18 year age old . BMI ≥ 19 ≤ 30 . Negative : 1 . HIV . 2 . Hepatitis B surface antigen Hepatitis C antibody . 3 . Using drug abuse test ( marijuana , amphetamine , barbiturate , cocaine , opiates , benzodiazepine methadone ) . 4 . Urine cotinine test 5 . Serum HCG consistent pregnancy ( female ) No significant diseases clinically significant finding physical examination . No clinically significant abnormal laboratory value . No clinically significant finding vital sign measurement 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Be informed nature study give write consent prior receive study procedure . Females participate study : 1. unable child ( e.g . postmenopausal , tubal ligation , hysterectomy ) OR 2. willing remain abstinent [ engage sexual intercourse ] OR 3. willing use effective method doublebarrier birth control ( e.g . partner use condom female use diaphragm , contraceptive sponge , spermicide IUD ) Females participate study pregnant and/or nonlactating . Known history presence clinically significant medical condition . Known suspected carcinoma . Known history presence : 1 . Hypersensitivity idiosyncratic reaction ursodiol and/or drug substance similar activity . 2 . Alcoholism within last 12 month . 3 . Drug dependence and/or substance abuse . 4 . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within last 6 month . On special diet within 4 week prior drug administration ( e.g . liquid , protein , raw food diet ) . Participated another clinical trial receive investigational product within 30 day prior drug administration . Donated 250 mL blood within previous 30 day OR Donated 251 499 mL blood previous 45 day OR Donated 499 mL blood previous 56 day ( base Canadian Blood Services guideline blood donation . Females take oral transdermal hormonal contraceptive within 14 day precede period 1 dosing . Females take implanted injected hormonal contraceptive within 6 month prior period 1 dosing . Requirement nontopical medication ( prescription and/or overthecounter , systemic absorption ) routine basis . Difficulty fast consume standard meal . Do tolerate venipuncture . Unable read sign ICF .
